properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 1 at 4:51AM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service Office in Riverton.

* WHAT...A Northwest wind 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph.
Localized gusts up to 60 mph are possible north of Crowheart.

* WHERE...The Upper Wind River Basin, Dubois, and Crowheart.

* WHEN...Now through New Year's Day.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be difficult over Highway 26.
Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Roads
may also become slick in spots.

NWSheadline: Strong Gusty Winds through New Year's Day
